title: Westwood 2BR 2BA Near UCLA! W/ Parking/Kitchen Appliances/Balcony
posting_body: ['Spacious and Bright 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath Apartment in Prime Westwood Location near UCLA!', 'Please do not visit property without our leasing agent.', 'Thank you!', 'Experience a carefree, relaxing lifestyle at The Hilgard.', 'Perfectly situated in a very cosmopolitan neighborhood, The Hilgard is the ideal place to call home!', 'Our convenient location puts you within walking distance of everything in Westwood Village, just two blocks north of Wilshire and one block east of Westwood Boulevard and one block from UCLA!', 'The Hilgard reaches new heights in apartment living with contemporary features uniquely designed to create a carefree and relaxing lifestyle.', 'We offer apartments that combine charming style with attractive amenities that you will surely appreciate.', 'Apartment features include spacious living areas perfect for entertaining, with hardwood floors, a breakfast bar, great views, a gas fireplace, air conditioning and more!', 'Enjoy quality living at an affordable price at The Hilgard.', 'Kitchen is equipped with granite countertops, a refrigerator, a dishwasher, an oven and gas stove.', 'Tile kitchen and bathroom floors.', "With our dedicated maintenance department, you'll have more opportunities to enjoy life.", 'Our residents enjoy some of the best community amenities available anywhere.', 'Take advantage of several public parks nearby or enjoy our picnic area with barbecues.', 'Apply at <URL> or call us today at', 'show contact info', '!', '972 Hilgard Avenue', 'Westwood, Los Angeles, California, 90024', 'Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hill', '2 bedroom apartment offers the following amenities:', 'Refrigerator', 'Stove', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Wood Flooring', 'Central Air And Heating', 'Extra Storage', 'Granite Countertops', 'Assigned Parking', 'Elevator', 'Controlled Access', 'Roof Terrace', 'BBQ/Grill Area', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Cozy Gas Fireplace', 'Disclaimer: Pictures are a representation but may not be of the exact apartment.', 'Advertised unit availability, rental rates, and terms are updated every 24 hours and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Please call for latest availability details.']
